entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is being questioned by Snape in the bathroom.

relationships.description: Snape is questioning Harry Potter about his use of Dark magic.
Harry Potter is being questioned by Snape in the bathroom.
Myrtle, also known as Moaning Myrtle, is disturbed by Harry's presence and wails and sobs.
